title: New: Anna Melkild – I'm Alive
body:
Norwegian singer **Anna Melkild**, formerly of Sassybeat (what a name, right?) unveils her debut solo outing in the form of the epic _I’m Alive_.

Drawing comparisons to Bergen’s recent starlet AURORA, as well as Björk and PJ Harvey, it’s upbeat and definitely feels like there’s potentially a lot more to come rom Melkild. Check it out below.
